==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=卖}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|出|買|t1=output|t2=goods|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}. Also {{liushu|ic|nocap=1}}.

{{zh-l|*出}} indicates the exporting side of the selling/buying deal. It was reduced to {{zh-l|*士}}.

===Etymology===
[[exoactive|Exoactive]] of {{och-l|買|to buy}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[sell]]
#: {{zh-x|他們 在 集市 賣 蔬菜 和 雞蛋。|They '''sell''' vegetables and eggs in the marketplace.}}
#: {{zh-x|這 本 書 不 賣。|This book is not '''for sale'''.}}
# to [[betray]]
#: {{zh-x|出賣|to betray}}
#: {{zh-x|賣友求榮|to '''betray''' someone to obtain promotion}}
# to [[spare]] no [[effort]], to do one's [[best]]
# to [[show off]]
#: {{zh-x|賣弄|to show off}}
#: {{zh-x|賣功|to '''show off''' one's merit}}
